column9: I can not describe this restaurant differently than the average in everything. Tha lamb was hard and flooded with salty sauce, salad bar with only few options, the decor outdated, nice service and moderate prices.

column7: Anywhere else would have been better
column9: I regret eating at this restaurant. The beef in the burger was something undefined, but definently never har been cow. Even McDonalds would have been better (and cheaper). We ended up leaving most of the food and had second lunch elsewhere.

column7: A bit of a mixed bag

column7: Bad service, waiting time too long!
